summary.para: Contains interfaces and classes that are specific to the WinForms Notifications Module.
Contains options that you can use to configure the Notifications Module.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Notifications.Win.NotificationsOptions.CanAccessPostponedItems

summary.para: Specifies if the ShowNotifications Action remains enabled when there are postponed notifications and no active notifications.

member.value: true, if the ShowNotifications Action remains enabled when there are postponed notifications and no active notifications; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Notifications.Win.NotificationsOptions.NotificationsRefreshInterval

summary.para: Specifies the amount of time between successive refreshes of the notifications.

member.value: A value that specifies the amount of time between successive refreshes of the notifications. The default value is 5 min.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Notifications.Win.NotificationsOptions.NotificationsStartDelay

summary.para: Specifies the delay from the application start to the initial Reminders Window display.

member.value: A value that specifies the delay from the application start to the initial Reminders Window display. The default is 5 seconds.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Notifications.Win.NotificationsOptions.ShowDismissAllAction

summary.para: Specifies whether or not the DismissAll Action is active in the Reminders Window.

member.value: true, if the DismissAll Action is active; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Notifications.Win.NotificationsOptions.ShowNotificationsWindow

summary.para: Specifies if the Reminders Window is displayed automatically or a user should invoke it manually.

member.value: true if the window is displayed automatically; otherwise, false. The default is true.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Notifications.Win.NotificationsOptions.ShowRefreshAction

summary.para: Specifies whether or not the Refresh Action is active in the Reminders Window.

member.value: true, if the Refresh Action is active; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Inherits from the to implement WinForms specific behavior.
Creates a new instance of the class.
Contains classes and interfaces that allow you to configure your WinForms application in the fluent API-based application builder.
Extends the interface with a method to add the Notifications Module to your application.
Adds the Notifications Module to your application.

member.param: Allows you to register and configure Modules in your application, and chain further Module registrations.
Options that you can use to configure the Notifications Module.
member.returns: Allows you to register and configure Modules in your application, and chain further Module registrations.
